description: PL/M was developed by Gary Kildall in the early 1970s for Intel 8-bit microprocessors, such as the 8008, 8080, 8085, 8086, and 80186. The language was also used in Zilog Z80 based systems during the 1970s and 1980s.
PL/M is no longer supported by Intel but there are several programs still available that can compile the language to microcomputer machine code or translate it to C source code.
